item.title: Mcintosh XR50 Bookshelf Speaker Review
item.description: Foreword / YouTube Video Review These speakers were loaned to me by Audio Advice. If you are interested in purchasing these speakers or anything else through Audio Advice, please see the link at the bottom of this page.
